name: v3.0.0
body:
* Turn on warnings for tests (#182)
    - This will help spot issues that may go unnoticed.
* Drop EOL Ruby versions (#181)
    - Supporting Ruby versions all the way back to 1.8.7 doesn't make sense. 1.8.7 and 1.9.2 EOL'ed 6 years ago. We will only be maintaining stable releases going forward.
* Use `require_relative` instead of `require` (#175)
    - This will speed up loading considerably as it does not have to traverse the files.

name: v2.1.2
body:
* Update VMODL database to fix #157 and fix #159 (#160)
* Fix warnings throughout codebase (#158)

name: v2.1.1
body: * Add option for close_on_exit

name: v2.1.0
body: * Regenerate VMODL for 6.7u1

name: v2.0.1
body:
* Fix wsdl_types of HostPortGroup and HostVirtualNic (#151)
* Don't install bundler in travis before_install (#152)
* Update Travis Ruby versions (#149)
* Only ship the necessary libs in the gem artifact (#148)

name: v2.0.0
body:
* Switched to Optimist. (#145)
* Add an example of deleting a disk from a VM (#144)

name: v1.13.0
body:
* vim.rb: enhance the logic of vim.rev. (#139)
* Fix HostVirtualSwitch/HostScsiTopology wsdl_types (#138)

name: v1.12.0
body: * Add support for 6.7.0

name: v1.11.7
body: * Duplicate attribute in vmodl.db (#131)

name: v1.11.6
body: * Fix system call parameter for STDOUT to use :out (#124)

name: v1.11.5
body:
* Correct vmodl.db changes
* Fix broken test

name: v1.11.4
body: * Update vmodl database (for #127)

name: v1.11.3
body: * Add PBM objects back to vmodl.db

name: v1.11.2
body: * Remove the overriden network on VirtualMachine

name: v1.11.1
body: * CachedOVFDeployer: allow to skip delta disk layer

name: v1.11.0
body:
* Add ability to set operation ID for tracing
* Add search for VM or host by instance UUID

name: v1.10.0
body: Add support for vSphere 6.5

name: v1.9.5
body: - Handle closing a session properly

name: v1.9.4
body: Fix for 6.0 vmodl.db (#95)

name: v1.9.3
body:
- Fixed bug in returning info for DynamicTypeMgrManagedTypeInfo
- Added CONTRIBUTORS.md

name: v1.9.2
body: - Fix Gem installation issue (#86)

name: v1.9.1
body:
- Move Ruby 1.8/1.9 gem pinnings to Gemfile to use newer versions
- Update README.rdoc with suggested pins for 1.8.7

name: v1.9.0
body:
- [Fix improper namespacing issue in `lib/rbvmomi/utils/admission_control.rb`](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/074285652c9e023a953c77468c6ec580a522a3b3)
- [Add `deploymentOption` to options to pass into `RbVmomi::VIM::OvfManager#deployOVF`](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/cc3469fe177f8aacac76689ef9f9122937a2ab8c)
- [Add SSPI support](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/9ae8380f0ea94c49c6ac787632a20fc899f2ed32)
- [Update `vmodl.db` to include vSphere 6.0 support](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/5ed2c41516a066907dc2b807152cf505469dfdca)
- [Add `dynamicData` and `dynamicProperty` to `DynamicData`](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/269a9e05676c7976b25245612bb62ec496053c4b)
- [Fix improper namespacing issue in `lib/rbvmomi/utils/perfdump.rb`](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/5ee8ec4fdfdb9edfad36f057bb1e77b9dd72a58a)
- [Allow custom timeout settings](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/24b56c3b21950e4a590a776651396552b34dad4f)
- [Fix DC path to allow uploads to datacenters inside of top level folders](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/52a66e00fde0c1eacba11502cdd5360128bda3e5)
- [Added `RbVmomi::BasicTypes::DataObject#to_json`](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/fd83a5c04a2bcf7fef7d235d03a0b60d7e05fdef)
- [Added a convenience function to find a folder `RbVmomi::VIM::Datacenter#find_folder`](https://github.com/vmware/rbvmomi/commit/76cc9687347bbd2cc75050fbb9b9cf6d4e39b575)

name: v1.8.2 - bug fix release
